{"id":1130937445,"question_id":3235,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1703804827,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1130937445/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Convert String I","memory":"45.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    final long MAX = (long)1e18;\n    public long minimumCost(String source, String target, char[] original, char[] changed, int[] cost) {\n        long[][] arr = new long[26][26];\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){\n            Arrays.fill(arr[i], MAX);\n            arr[i][i] = 0;\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<original.length;i++){\n            long cur = arr[original[i]-'a'][changed[i]-'a'];\n            arr[original[i]-'a'][changed[i]-'a'] = Math.min((long)cost[i], cur);\n        }\n        \n        for(int k=0;k<26;k++){\n            for(int i=0;i<26;i++){\n                if(arr[i][k]<MAX){\n                    for(int j=0;j<26;j++){\n                        arr[i][j] = Math.min(arr[i][j], arr[i][k] + arr[k][j]);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        long ans = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<source.length();i++){\n            ans+= arr[source.charAt(i) - 'a'][target.charAt(i) - 'a'];\n            if(ans>=MAX){\n                return -1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-convert-string-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
